judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed at appellant’s cost.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Lowenburg v. Barr, Appellant.
Argued May 2, 1969.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Daniel B. Pierson, V, with him Raspin, Espenshade, Heins, Ershine & Stewart, for appellant.
Edward Faehenthal, with him William L. O’Hey, Jr., and Henderson, Wetherill & O’Hey, for appellee.
October 9, 1969:
